summary.title: Resume
summary.subtitle: A Brief
summary.blurb: Northwestern grad; I’ve worked for startups, agencies and as a freelancer
summary.more: Check out my full resume for a more detailed list of tools and experience

header.name: Chris Zamierowski
header.blurb: I’m a multidisciplinary thinker producing (mostly) front-end web solutions. I'm looking to join, learn from and collaborate with a talented team that pushes me to create my best work, from initial concept to shipping a product.

sections.title: What I Like To Work On
Current Toolset
sections.description: JavaScript (ES6), Vue.js, Webpack, HTML5, Sass, Sketch, Ruby on Rails, Node.js, Docker, Bulma, gulp, Express, Karma, Jasmine, Sublime Text, Sketch, Photoshop, Zeplin, Git (CLI), Heroku, AWS S3, Google Analytics, Mixpanel, Rollbar, Trello, Asana, Pivotal Tracker, Balsamiq, pen & paper, Slack

jobs.description: Provide early-stage startups with a range of services including full-stack web development, interaction design, UI design and product strategy.
Worked with a small team to build a single-page online dashboard and custom hybrid app on devices across multiple operating systems in 30+ languages for Intel.

First hire: responsible for full UI, design and development of AngularJS + Node.js web stack. Designed site UI, designed and built an embeddable module for restaurants' sites, did a significant amount of brainstorming and prototyping, and conducted user research.
Built and managed front-end of betterfly.com (acquired 2013), including custom online video chat tool, simple document sharing/organization application and internet connection speed wizard.
Worked together with UI, IA and UX design teams to build and deliver sites for clients including Discover Financial Services and E*TRADE.

sections.title: Education
sections.subtitle: Northwestern University, McCormick School of Engineering
description: Master of Science in Computer Science, 2011.
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Animate Arts (Adjunct Major), 2010.

sections.title: Tidbits
description: I sometimes stand while I work.
I eat kiwis with the skin on.
I appreciate a good oatmeal stout.
